articles.title: Police consulted over fears Liverpool fans could mob streets on day Reds win title - Mirror Online
articles.description: Preventing Liverpool fans flooding the streets of Merseyside when the Reds inevitably win the title could be a stumbling block to a resumption of Premier League football
